test_cases.title: Create Standard PO with Valid Data
test_cases.description: Verify that a procurement user can create a standard Purchase Order with valid vendor, material, quantity, price, plant, and delivery date.
preconditions: Vendor, material, plant master data exists
test_steps: Enter valid vendor, material, quantity, price, plant, and delivery date
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created with a unique number, visible in PO history, and no FI document is posted.

test_cases.title: PO Creation with Missing Mandatory Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that PO creation fails when mandatory fields are missing.
test_steps: Leave vendor and material fields blank
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error messages for missing mandatory fields and does not create PO.

test_cases.title: PO Creation with Invalid Quantity
test_cases.description: Verify that PO creation fails when quantity is zero or negative.
test_steps: Enter valid vendor and material, set quantity to 0
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for invalid quantity and does not create PO.

test_cases.title: PO Creation with Future Delivery Date
test_cases.description: Verify that PO can be created with a delivery date in the future.
test_steps: Enter valid vendor, material, quantity, price, plant, and set delivery date to 30 days in future
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created successfully and visible in PO history.

test_cases.title: Verify No FI Document on PO Creation
test_cases.description: Ensure that no FI document is posted upon PO creation.
test_steps: Check FI document postings for the PO
test_cases.expected_results: No FI document is posted for the PO creation event.

test_cases.title: PO Approval by Correct Approver
test_cases.description: Verify that PO is routed to the correct approver based on release strategy.
test_cases.expected_results: PO status updates to approved, approval action is logged.

test_cases.title: PO Rejection with Comments
test_cases.description: Verify that approver can reject a PO and add comments.
test_steps: Select PO and reject with comments
test_cases.expected_results: PO status updates to rejected, comments are visible in PO history.

test_cases.title: Unauthorized User Attempts PO Approval
test_cases.description: Verify that a user without approval rights cannot approve a PO.
test_steps: Login as user without approval role
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents approval and displays authorization error.

test_cases.title: PO Approval Audit Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that all PO approval actions are logged for audit purposes.
test_cases.expected_results: All approval actions are logged with user, date, time, and comments.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt for Approved PO
test_cases.description: Verify that warehouse user can post Goods Receipt for an approved PO.
test_steps: Enter received quantity and post GR
test_cases.expected_results: GR is posted, inventory/expense updated, GR/IR account credited, FI document generated.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt for Unapproved PO
test_cases.description: Verify that GR cannot be posted for an unapproved PO.
test_steps: Attempt to post GR for unapproved PO
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents GR posting and displays error.

test_cases.title: Partial Goods Receipt Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that partial GR can be posted and remaining quantity is tracked.
test_steps: Enter received quantity less than PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Partial GR is posted, remaining quantity tracked, FI document generated.

test_cases.title: Full Goods Receipt Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that full GR can be posted and PO is marked as fully received.
test_steps: Enter received quantity equal to PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Full GR is posted, PO marked as fully received, FI document generated.

test_cases.title: Goods Receipt Exceeding PO Quantity
test_cases.description: Verify that system notifies user if GR quantity exceeds PO quantity.
test_steps: Enter received quantity greater than PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: System displays warning or error, prevents posting, and notifies user.

test_cases.title: FI Document Generation on GR Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that FI document is generated automatically upon GR posting.
test_steps: Review FI documents for posted GR
test_cases.expected_results: FI document is present, GR/IR credited, inventory/expense debited.

test_cases.title: Post Vendor Invoice with 3-Way Matching
test_cases.description: Verify that accounts payable user can post vendor invoice against PO and GR with successful 3-way matching.
test_steps: Enter invoice details matching PO and GR
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is posted, FI document generated, invoice processed for payment.

test_cases.title: Invoice Posting with Price Discrepancy Beyond Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice with price discrepancy beyond tolerance is blocked for payment.
test_steps: Enter invoice price exceeding PO price by more than tolerance
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked for payment, user notified, visible in reporting.

test_cases.title: Invoice Posting with Quantity Discrepancy Within Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice with quantity discrepancy within tolerance is processed for payment.
test_steps: Enter invoice quantity slightly different from GR but within tolerance
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is posted and processed for payment.

test_cases.title: Invoice Posting with Quantity Exceeding PO
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice with quantity exceeding PO is blocked for payment.
test_steps: Enter invoice quantity greater than PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked for payment, user notified, visible in reporting.

test_cases.title: FI Document Generation on Invoice Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that FI document is created automatically when invoice is posted.
test_steps: Review FI documents for posted invoice
test_cases.expected_results: FI document is present, vendor account credited, GR/IR debited.

test_cases.title: Automatic Clearing of GR/IR Account on Invoice Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that GR/IR account is cleared automatically when invoice is posted.
test_steps: Review GR/IR account balance before and after invoice posting
test_cases.expected_results: GR/IR account is cleared for matched quantities and values.

test_cases.title: Open GR/IR Balances Reporting
test_cases.description: Verify that open GR/IR balances are tracked and reported.
test_cases.expected_results: Open and cleared GR/IR balances are displayed by PO, vendor, and period.

test_cases.title: No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close
test_cases.description: Verify that no open GR/IR balances remain at period close beyond tolerances.
test_cases.expected_results: No open GR/IR balances beyond tolerance limits at period close.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access for Procurement User
test_cases.description: Verify that procurement user can only access procurement functions.
test_steps: Attempt to access procurement, warehouse, and finance functions
test_cases.expected_results: User can access procurement functions only; other functions are restricted.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access for Finance User
test_cases.description: Verify that finance user can only access finance functions.
test_steps: Attempt to access procurement, warehouse, and finance functions
test_cases.expected_results: User can access finance functions only; other functions are restricted.

test_cases.title: Unauthorized Access Attempt Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that unauthorized access attempts are logged.
test_cases.expected_results: Access denied and attempt is logged for audit.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties Enforcement
test_cases.description: Verify that system prevents assignment of conflicting roles to a single user.
test_steps: Attempt to assign procurement and accounts payable roles to same user
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents assignment and displays error.

test_cases.title: Procurement User Cannot Post Invoice
test_cases.description: Verify that procurement user cannot post vendor invoices.
test_cases.expected_results: System denies access and displays authorization error.

test_cases.title: Accounts Payable User Cannot Create PO
test_cases.description: Verify that accounts payable user cannot create or approve POs.
test_steps: Attempt to create or approve PO
test_cases.expected_results: System denies access and displays authorization error.

test_cases.title: Warehouse User Cannot Approve PO
test_cases.description: Verify that warehouse user cannot approve POs.
test_cases.expected_results: System denies access and displays authorization error.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties Violation Reporting
test_cases.description: Verify that segregation of duties violations are reported.
test_steps: Review segregation of duties violation report
test_cases.expected_results: Violations are listed with user details and actions taken.

test_cases.title: 3-Way Matching Passes for Invoice
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice passes 3-way matching when quantity and price match PO and GR.
test_steps: Post invoice with matching quantity and price
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice passes 3-way match and is processed for payment.

test_cases.title: 3-Way Matching Failure Notification
test_cases.description: Verify that user is notified when 3-way matching fails.
test_steps: Post invoice with mismatched quantity or price
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks invoice, notifies user, and logs matching failure.

test_cases.title: Audit Logging for P2P Transactions
test_cases.description: Verify that all P2P transactions are logged with user, date, and time.
preconditions: PO, GR, IR, FI postings performed
test_cases.expected_results: All transactions are logged with required details.

test_cases.title: Audit Log Integrity
test_cases.description: Verify that audit logs cannot be altered by end users.
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents modification and logs attempt.

test_cases.title: Audit Trail Compliance
test_cases.description: Verify that audit trails meet company and regulatory standards.
test_steps: Review audit trail format and content
test_cases.expected_results: Audit trails comply with company and regulatory requirements.

test_cases.title: Real-Time FI Posting for PO, GR, IR
test_cases.description: Verify that all PO, GR, and Invoice transactions generate immediate FI postings.
test_steps: Review FI postings after each transaction
test_cases.expected_results: FI postings are generated instantly for each transaction.

test_cases.title: Financial Reports Reflect P2P Transactions Instantly
test_cases.description: Verify that financial reports reflect P2P transactions in real time.
test_steps: Verify inclusion of latest P2P transactions
test_cases.expected_results: Reports include all recent P2P transactions.

test_cases.title: Integration Error Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that integration errors between P2P and FI are logged and reported.
test_cases.expected_results: Error is logged and reported to relevant users.

test_cases.title: Master Data Creation for Vendor
test_cases.description: Verify that master data manager can create a new vendor record.
test_cases.expected_results: Vendor record is created and available for use.

test_cases.title: Master Data Creation with Incomplete Data
test_cases.description: Verify that system prevents creation of master data with incomplete mandatory fields.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and does not create record.

test_cases.title: Master Data Change Audit Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that changes to master data are logged for audit.
test_cases.expected_results: Change is logged with user, date, and time.

test_cases.title: Unauthorized Master Data Creation Attempt
test_cases.description: Verify that unauthorized users cannot create or update master data.
preconditions: User without master data manager role
test_steps: Attempt to create or update vendor record
test_cases.expected_results: System denies access and logs attempt.

test_cases.title: Blocked Invoice Visible in Reporting
test_cases.description: Verify that blocked invoices are visible in reporting.
test_cases.expected_results: Blocked invoices are listed and visible for review.

test_cases.title: Blocked Invoice Requires Manual Release
test_cases.description: Verify that blocked invoices require manual review and release.
test_steps: Attempt to process payment for blocked invoice
test_cases.expected_results: Payment processing is excluded until manual release; release action is logged.

test_cases.title: Notification of Blocked Invoice
test_cases.description: Verify that user receives notification when invoice is blocked.
test_cases.expected_results: User receives notification of blocked invoice.

test_cases.title: Track Procurement and Financial Impact in Real Time
test_cases.description: Verify that users can view up-to-date status of POs, GRs, and invoices.
test_steps: Review status of POs, GRs, invoices
test_cases.expected_results: Statuses are up-to-date and reflect latest transactions.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Data Refreshes Automatically
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard data refreshes automatically without manual update.
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard updates automatically to show new transaction.

test_cases.title: Drill Down from Summary to Transaction Details
test_cases.description: Verify that users can drill down from dashboard summary to transaction details.
test_cases.expected_results: User can view detailed information for selected metric.

test_cases.title: View PO History with All Events
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view complete PO history including creation, approval, GR, and invoice events.
preconditions: PO created, approved, GR and IR posted
test_steps: Access PO history from PO screen
test_cases.expected_results: PO history displays all events with timestamps and user actions.

summary: 50 comprehensive test cases were generated, covering positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for all major functionalities and controls of the SAP S/4HANA P2P process, mapped to user stories and requirements. Test cases include detailed steps, expected results, and cover PO creation/approval, GR/IR, FI integration, controls, reporting, master data, audit, and compliance.
